required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study of Apatinib in Patients With Differentiated Thyroid Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: Study of Apatinib in Patients With Local Advanced/Metastatic Iodine-131（131I）-Refractory/Resistant Differentiated Thyroid Cancer

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to assess the efficacy and safety of apatinib in locally advanced/metastatic radioactive iodine-refractory/resistant differentiated thyroid cancer

intervention.description: Apatinib Mesylate Tablets 750 mg q.d p.o. in 1-10 cases of differentiated thyroid cancer subjects.
Apatinib Mesylate Tablets 500 mg q.d. p.o. in 11-20 cases of differentiated thyroid cancer subjects.
